posts.post_content:
I am looking to purchase a bunch of T206 cards in PSA 6 grade.  A bulk or lot of these would be great. 1 card or 50 cards.  Minor Leaguers or commons preferred.  I only have about 25% of the set so the chances are good that I need what you have.


Please PM if you have some to sell. 


Thanks,

David :)
